title: ART//ACT
blurb: In this two-part series we explored the idea of "artistic activism". Over the course of these events we discovered how local change-makers are taking a stance on global issues through artistic platforms.
description: In this two-part series we explored the idea of "artistic activism". Over the course of these events we discovered how local change-makers are taking a stance on global issues through artistic platforms.

title: Biomedical Engineering Salon
blurb: Held at Harry Perkins Institute of Medical Research, we had a splendid night of talks centred around the importance of mental health.
description: Held at Harry Perkins Institute of Medical Research, we had a splendid night of talks centred around the importance of mental health.

title: TEDxUWA 2017: The Future Blueprint
blurb: The 2nd TEDxUWA Conference brought together a pionering squad of changemakers for a day full of ideas worth spreading. From talks to poetry, workshops to drone races, it was a day to remember.
description: The 2nd TEDxUWA Conference brought together a pionering squad of changemakers for a day full of ideas worth spreading. From talks to poetry, workshops to drone races, it was a day to remember.

title: TEDxUWA 2016: Changing Perceptions
blurb: The TEDxUWA Conference is the most highly anticipated event in the TEDxUWA calendar. It gave a platform to explore ideas of social justice, economic transformation.
description: The TEDxUWA Conference is the most highly anticipated event in the TEDxUWA calendar. It gave a platform to explore ideas of social justice, economic transformation.

title: VGen & TEDxUWA Ideas Night
blurb: Presented by TEDxUWA and World Vision's VGen; a night of sharing ideas from arround Western Australia and across the globe including issues including inequality and homelessness.
description: Presented by TEDxUWA and World Vision's VGen; a night of sharing ideas from arround Western Australia and across the globe including issues including inequality and homelessness.

title: Masterpiece Micro Conference Salon
blurb: Held in the Lawrence Wilson Art Gallery, the theme was Arts and Culture. It's big, it's broad and had the audience all "oooohs" and "ahhhhs"
description: Held in the Lawrence Wilson Art Gallery, the theme was Arts and Culture. It's big, it's broad and had the audience all "oooohs" and "ahhhhs"
